name: Flannel Shirt
description: Fu Shou Shan is an incredibly flavorful and complex tea with an amazing degree of balance and concentration, with absolutely no astringency or bitterness. The finish is rich, unctuous and persistent.

name: Formosa Red 20
description: Formosa Red 20 is a black tea with natural honeyed sweetness, underpinned by complex notes of tropical fruit and citrus.

name: Cloud and Mist
description: This tea has a light smoky and vegetal taste. The aroma is slightly floral with an underlying note of roasted macadamia.

name: Xin Gong Yi
description: Xin Gong Yi is sweet without being cloying, and distinct without sacrificing roundness. The combination of flavors is remarkably similar to an early flush of Darjeeling.
